api_list.name: Medarplay points
api_list.description: This Endpoints directs you to our website
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://medarplay-africa.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "medarplay-africa.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
